name: picocolors
description: The tiniest and the fastest library for terminal output formatting with ANSI colors

scripts.install-benchmarks: npm install --no-save esbuild "benchmark@^2" "mitata@^1" picocolors-upstream@"npm:picocolors@^1"  "ansi-colors@^4" "cli-color@^2" chalk4@"npm:chalk@^4" chalk5@"npm:chalk@^5" "colorette@^2" "kleur@^4" "nanocolors@^0" "yoctocolors@^2"
scripts.build-benchmarks: node print-chalk5.mjs | esbuild --outfile=benchmarks/chalk5.js --bundle --platform=node && node print-yoctocolors.mjs | esbuild --outfile=benchmarks/yoctocolors.js --bundle --platform=node && node cleanup-yoctocolors.mjs
scripts.test: node tests/test.js && node tests/esm.mjs && node tests/types.mjs

author: Alexey Raspopov
